00019 DecodeDialog::DecodeDialog(QWidget* parent)
00020     : OptionDialog(parent)
00021 {
00022     this->setObjectName("DecodeDialog");
00023     m_logger->setClassName("DecodeDialog");
00024 
00025     this->setWindowTitle("Decode message");
00026     this->setWindowIcon(QPixmap(QString::fromUtf8(":/icons/img/decode.png")));
00027 
00028     okButton->setText("Decode");
00029     iconLabel->setPixmap(QPixmap(QString::fromUtf8(":/icons/img/decode.png")));
00030     msgLabel->setText("Decoded message");
00031 
00032     outputWidget->setVisible(false);
00033     msgTextEdit->setReadOnly(true);
00034 }

00036 void DecodeDialog::showEvent(QShowEvent* event)
00037 {
00038     if(!event->spontaneous())
00039     {
00040         msgTextEdit->setText("");
00041         cryptoPwd1LineEdit->setText("");
00042         cryptoPwd2LineEdit->setText("");
00043         checkCryptoPassword();
00044         imageFormatChanged(imageFormatComboBox->currentText());
00045     }
00046 }
00047 
00048 QWidget* DecodeDialog::currentFormatWidget(FormatModuleInterface* module)
00049 {
00050     if (module == NULL)
00051         return NULL;
00052 
00053     return module->decodeWidget();
00054 }
00055 
00056 void DecodeDialog::ok()
00057 {
00058     if(!isDialogReady())
00059         return;
00060     msgTextEdit->setText("");
00061 
00062     if(!currentFormatModule()->isDecodeWidgetReady())
00063     {
00064         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"),
00065                              QString("Wrong options for the current encoding image format.\n")+
00066                              "Please check your options values before launching the decoding process.");
00067         return;
00068     }
00069 
00070     m_img = currentFormatModule()->decodeImage(m_img);
00071     if(cryptoCheckBox->checkState()!=Qt::Unchecked)
00072     {
00073         CryptoModuleInterface* module = currentCryptoModule();
00074         if(module!=NULL)
00075         {
00076             m_img->load(EncodedData::BYTES);
00077             try{
00078                 EncodedData data = module->decode(cryptoPwd2LineEdit->text(), m_img->data());
00079                 msgTextEdit->setText(data.toString(currentCharset()));
00080             }catch(ModuleException e){
00081                 displayModuleException(module->name(), e);
00082             }
00083         }
00084         else
00085             m_logger->warning("Invalid encryption type");
00086     }
00087     else if(m_img->load(currentCharset()))
00088         msgTextEdit->setText(m_img->data().toString());
00089     else
00090         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"),
00091                              "This image don't seem to have an hidden message.");
00092 
00093 }
